answers.text:
This topic, Outsourcing Payroll was posted three years ago, with no responses.  Are there any communities that have experiences outsourcing payroll they could share?  Thanks.

author: Angel Smith
text:
Hello! 
Are there any municipalities currently outsourcing their payroll services? 
If so, I am interested in knowing the size of your organization and which company you are using.
Thanks,
title: Outsourcing Payroll
